episodes.title: Eikev: It Comes Down To Love
episodes.description: We have 613 commandments in our Torah, but this week Moses reduces what we’re asked to do to a few simple guidelines For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Vaetchanan: Remember don’t Guard
episodes.description: What’s the difference between the 10 Commandments here and in Shemot/Exodus? One word can have a great deal of significance For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Devarim: The Gift of Time
episodes.description: Moses knows that his death is imminent and so receives the gift of time for one final book of Torah. What can we learn from his example? For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Matot-Masei: Our Responsibility to Others
episodes.description: What does the rescue of the soccer team in Thailand have to do with this week’s Torah portion? It’s all about our responsibility. For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Pinchas: Speak Truth To Power
episodes.description: The daughter of Zelophchad set an example of challenging authority – and they did it together so that we could benefit from the example that they set For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Balak: Trusting Your Gut
episodes.description: We have our guts and our instincts that we can trust, Balaam had the voice of God, but he ignored that voice and we know that things not go accordingly to his plan. episodes.title: Chukat: Responsibilities of Leadership
episodes.description: When we assume a position as leaders, more is expected of us and so we must always behave in a way that is fitting of the role that we have assumed – Moses learns that lesson the hard way in this week’s Torah portion For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening […]

episodes.title: Sh’lach-Lecha: Be Like Caleb
episodes.description: The power of one person to make a difference is clear throughout history and here we see Caleb attempt to be that man For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Beha’alotcha: Eat What You’re Given
episodes.description: For the Israelites in the wilderness the manna had become boring and so they complained and cried out. God was clearly displeased by the response. For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Naso: Confession

episodes.title: Bamidbar: The Passage of Time

For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt […]

episodes.title: Behar-Bechukotai: Owning The Land
episodes.description: What can the lessons of the Jubilee Year teach us about our connection to land and a place on this earth? For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Emor: Breaking Bread Together
episodes.description: At the Tabernacle the High Priest brought 12 loaves of bread together as a way of bringing the community together each and every Shabbat. Providing inspiration for us all. For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Achrei Mot-Kedoshim: Caring for Others

For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Tazria-Metzora: A Plague On Your House

For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Shmini: Food Glorious Food

episodes.title: Pesach: Know Your Story

episodes.title: Tzav: We Were There
episodes.description: There is a significance in witnessing something firsthand, rather than hearing about it after the fact. episodes.title: Vayikra: God Here And Everywhere

episodes.title: Tetzaveh: Sharing Power
episodes.description: Moses ordains Aaron as the High Priest this week and sets a crucial example of how power should never be held in one person’s hands but shared out amongst many. episodes.title: Terumah: A Divine Home

episodes.title: Mishpatim: The Right Order

episodes.title: Yitro: The Burden of Leadership
episodes.description: Yitro’s feedback to Moses isn’t just that what he’s doing is bad for him, it’s also bad for the people. For more information about Rabbi Danny, please visit www.RabbiDanny.com The opening and closing music for this podcast is Coming Out of the Dark by Matt Stamm.

episodes.title: Beshalach: Taking Responsibility

episodes.title: Bo: The Hardened Heart

episodes.title: Vaera: Refreshing Our Spirits
episodes.description: When Moses came to the Israelites with God’s promise they were not ready to listen. Their souls were crushed. But they found a way to move forward. episodes.title: Shemot: Know Your Story
